indicators.name: ODA with gender objectives (%, DAC 1/2)

indicators.name: ODA with gender as principal objective (%, DAC 2)
indicators.note: Focus 2030 did not specify a 2022 DAC 2 value; using OECD DCP two-year average (2021–22).
